name: Yıldırım Yutan Hiçlik Kurdu
desc:
A beast with monstrous blood that is capable of eroding the boundaries of the world. They were created by "Gold."
Once upon a time, they ran riot across the continent, but they went extinct for a time due to resistance and mass hunts. Recently, however, they have re-emerged. The pack of black wolves that now threaten Springvale and Wolvendom are such creatures.

dropMaterial.name: Gizli Pençe
dropMaterial.desc:
Residual body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
By ordinary logic, these objects, so alien to this world, should not have remained behind after these abnormal creatures were excised from the land.

dropMaterial.name: Gizli Keskin Pençe
dropMaterial.desc:
Body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
Though they are quite wondrous indeed, these hunting hounds of "Alfisol" are nothing of note before Durin of "Humus."

dropMaterial.name: Gizli Vahşi Pençe
dropMaterial.desc:
A sharp nail left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
All the marvels in the world must pale before "Cretaceus," the greatest work of them all.

dropMaterial.name: Kör Kılıç
dropMaterial.desc: Gençlik hayalleri ve maceracının heyecanı yetersiz kalıyorsa, açığı cesaretle kapat.

dropMaterial.name: Gümüş Kılıç
dropMaterial.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

dropMaterial.name: Avcı Yayı
dropMaterial.desc: Bir avcının şarkısında iki nota olur: Gerilen yayın sesi ve okların ıslığı.

dropMaterial.name: Usta Avcı Yayı
dropMaterial.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

dropMaterial.name: Çırağın Notları
dropMaterial.desc: Parlak bir öğrencinin notları. Göz alıcı bir el yazısıyla yazılmış en kullanışlı büyüleri içerir.

dropMaterial.name: Büyü Cep Kitabı
dropMaterial.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

dropMaterial.name: Darmaduman Büyük Kılıcı
dropMaterial.desc: Kalın ve sağlam bir demir levhadan yapılmış bir kılıç, güçlü bir iradeyle savrulduğunda dağları bile yerinden oynatabilir.

dropMaterial.name: İhtiyar Lejyonerin Dostu
dropMaterial.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

dropMaterial.name: Acemi Koruması
dropMaterial.desc: Bir bayrak direği kadar düz bir mızrak. Hemen hemen tüm savaş durumlarında avantaj sağlar ve savrulduğunda heybetiyle göz doldurur.

dropMaterial.name: Demir Nokta
dropMaterial.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

value.text: This is the mature form of a Rifthound Whelp... or so it would seem. However, these monsters do not have natural life cycles, and their growth remains a mystery. The Rifthound attacks can apply stacks of the "Corrosion" status, which will cause all characters in the party to <color=#ffe14b>continually lose HP</color> . Additionally, when they take elemental damage from their respective element, Rifthounds will enter an Elemental Devourer state that will allow them <color=#ffe14b>to fight more fiercely at the cost of lessened RES to that particular element</color> .
